summary: Removes the pauldrons from the female Leather Armor to resemble the Bosmer archer in the loading screens.
descriptionHtml:
Alternate Female Leather Armor Mod
By: Nexudude

------------
Description
------------
A simple replacement for the female Leather Armor model. I found it annoying that the female Bosmer in the loading screens wore leather armor without pauldrons but I couldn\'t, so I just made it myself.

------------
Installation
------------

Just extract the Data folder into your skyrim directory.
author: Nexudude
